Articles.Content:
This will be hopefully, an ongoing post about the Kerbal Aerospace Exploration Agency, or KAEA(pronounced kaya).  I may make other posts as I branch out into the Kerbal Airspace Defense Agency, or KADA, for military aircraft, and Kerbal Aerospace Infrastructure Agency, or KAIA, for space stations, refueling stations, and bases.

The first of KAEA's launches is the Dawn program's Louis probe.  Mission report here:

 

Part 1, KAEA Dawn program - Lewis probe (Suborbital flight)

http://imgur.com/gallery/b7HYI

Part 2, KAEA Dawn program - Clark probe (Orbital flight)

http://imgur.com/gallery/gGF44

Part 3, KAEA Dawn program - Sojourner probe (Orbital flight and reentry) 

http://imgur.com/gallery/iTkJA

Part 4, KAEA Dawn program - Pathfinder 1 (Manned orbital flight and reentry)

http://imgur.com/gallery/JnyA2

Part 5, KAEA Dawn program - Pathfinder 2 and 3 (Manned orbital flight, docking, and reentry)

http://imgur.com/gallery/lcfGL

Part 6, KAEA Dawn program - Pioneer 1(Mun flyby and return)

http://imgur.com/gallery/7LuHB

Part 7, KAEA Dawn program - Pioneer 2(Mun landing and return)

http://imgur.com/gallery/qSAha

Part 7, KAEA Dawn program - Pioneer 3(Mun Base)

http://imgur.com/gallery/nBPEN

Edited April 25, 2017 by SlabGizor117
I think posting to a topic bumps it up to the top, right?  Anyways, I added 3 missions to the post!
Bump for more missions added, assuming that replies move threads to the top... Right?
